data.comment: The match has started.
In Vancouver, Salt Lake push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Vancouver.
At BC Place, Vancouver are penalized for being offside.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Salt Lake are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 8, Fredy Montero (Vancouver) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver just outside Salt Lake's area.
In the minute 10, Free kick in a good position for Vancouver!
Ali Adnan (Vancouver) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver.
In the minute 14, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Vancouver's Fredy Montero has been booked in Vancouver.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Salt Lake needs to be cautious. Vancouver have an attacking throw-in.
Silviu Petrescu signals a throw-in for Vancouver, close to Salt Lake's area.
In the minute 18, Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Douglas Martinez for Salt Lake who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 23, Free kick Vancouver.
Salt Lake’s Douglas Martinez is on his feet again at BC Place.
Marcelo Silva (Salt Lake) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Silviu Petrescu signals a Vancouver throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In Vancouver, Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 28, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 30, Leonard Owusu's header is off-target for Vancouver.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 31, Justin Meram of Salt Lake gets in a strike, but is off target.
Silviu Petrescu awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Salt Lake.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, The match at BC Place has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jake Nerwinski, who is down injured.
Goal! Salt Lake have got their heads in front thanks to a Damir Kreilach strike.
Great play from Justin Meram to set up the goal.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Vancouver's Jake Nerwinski is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 39, Salt Lake are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At BC Place, Pablo Ruiz has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 42, Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 43, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Janio Bikel (Vancouver) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Salt Lake at BC Place.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Silviu Petrescu signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Salt Lake are whistled for offside.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at BC Place.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 45, Vancouver have a dangerous throw-in.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
The first-half is over at BC Place.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at BC Place.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 50, Throw-in high up the field for Vancouver in Vancouver.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick Vancouver.
Vancouver drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Vancouver.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Vancouver to check on Douglas Martinez, who is grimacing with pain.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Douglas Martinez for Salt Lake is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aaron Herrera (Salt Lake) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Fredy Montero (Vancouver) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Leonard Owusu with Michael Baldisimo.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 68, Silviu Petrescu signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Freddy Juarez is making the team's first substitution at BC Place with Corey Baird replacing Justin Meram.
Free kick Vancouver.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 70, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver.
The home team have replaced Russell Teibert with Ryan Raposo. This is the second substitution made today by Marc Dos Santos.
Douglas Martinez scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 1-1 at BC Place.
In the minute 72, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 73, Free kick Salt Lake.
Lucas Cavallini puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 76, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Douglas Martinez is booked for the away team.
Attention is being given to Vancouver’s Evan Bush and play has been suspended briefly.
Evan Bush returns to the field for Vancouver after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 78, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Cristian Dajome for Vancouver has been booked by Silviu Petrescu and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, Salt Lake drive upfield and Pablo Ruiz gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vancouver defender.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Salt Lake pushes forward through Maikel Chang, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeizon Ramirez is replacing Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake at BC Place.
In the minute 84, Salt Lake's Corey Baird misses with an attempt on goal.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Corey Baird (Salt Lake) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 85, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Derek Cornelius is on a sub for Fredy Montero for Vancouver.
Vancouver drives forward and Janio Bikel gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tosaint Ricketts is replacing Cristian Dajome for the home team.
In the minute 88, Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Vancouver.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Evan Bush has recovered and rejoins the match in Vancouver.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Vancouver.
Salt Lake's Jeizon Ramirez breaks free at BC Place. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Evan Bush is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ranko Veselinovic (Vancouver) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
